terminals.name: Toka CLI
terminals.description: Interactive Toka CLI for project management
terminals.command: cd /home/vscode && if [ -f 'Cargo.toml' ]; then cargo run --bin toka-cli -- interactive; else echo 'Waiting for project clone...'; bash; fi

terminals.name: Testing
terminals.command: cd /home/vscode && if [ -f 'Cargo.toml' ]; then cargo nextest run --workspace; else echo 'Project not ready for testing'; bash; fi
